name: Black&Red (bunkum)
description:
Thank you so much for taking the time to try out Black&Red.

An entry for the 'A Game by It's Cover' 2016 game jam based on a cart by Trikker: http://famicase.com/15/softs/84.html

All code, design and sound by Dan @ bunkum

More information at: bunkum.co or follow me on Twitter.
